name: JUICE-LESS
description:
Human art thief, Juice, has decided to upgrade their art collection by stealing super sick alien art from you guessed it, outer space. Juice will have to travel throughout the alien art museum to find their favorite piece of art and escape. What Juice doesn't know is that someone or someTHING is waiting for them. 

controls: WASD to walk, Shift to run and Space Bar to jump 

CREDITS:

Coding: Shakeema Blocker, Sully Lorino 

Art Direction: Sully Lorino

3D Environment: Julia Vuillermet 

3D Assets: Julia Vuillermet, Kyle Andrade 

Concepts: Kyle Andrade, Gianna DiMatteo, Sully Lorino, Julia Vuillermet

2D assets: Gianna DiMatteo, Shakeema Blocker

Itch Page: Gianna DiMatteo

Sound Design: Robyn Kim
